name: DesignRclassic® Furniture Lacquer Sealer
description: DesignRclassic® Furniture Lacquer Sealer is a fine furniture quality nitrocellulose lacquer that has excellent build and is fast drying. DesignRclassic Lacquer Sealer sands smooth and provides a flat sealed surface for DesignRclassic Lacquer Clear, it was specifically developed for the furniture industry to provide excellent scratch and mar resistance, a nice smooth-touch feel, optimal flow, clarity and outstanding depth of color.
